official_title: A bill to amend and extend Title I of the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act, as amended, for two years.

summary.text: Amends the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 to authorize appropriations for FY 1986 and 1987 to carry out that portion of the Act relating to ocean dumping regulation.

titles.title: A bill to amend and extend Title I of the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act, as amended, for two years.
